getSearchManager

SearchManager getSearchManager(String workspaceName)
                         throws javax.jcr.NoSuchWorkspaceException,
                                javax.jcr.RepositoryException
Returns the SearchManager for the workspace with name workspaceName.

Parameters:
workspaceName - the name of the workspace.
Returns:
the SearchManager for the workspace, or null if the workspace does not have a SearchManager configured.
Throws:
javax.jcr.NoSuchWorkspaceException - if there is no workspace with name workspaceName.
javax.jcr.RepositoryException - if an error occurs while opening the search index.
